**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 125 1.1 **Usage** affixed to armor or a weapon --- Appearing as vibrant as the day they were picked, this cluster of flowers is arranged in a small spray, tied with a red satin ribbon. The spell DC of any spell cast by activating this item is 24.
  • **Armor** You gain the ability to speak with flowers, as [_speak with plants_](/Spells.aspx?ID=294).
  • **Weapon** ([disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) After you cast a [plant](/Traits.aspx?ID=125) spell by activating the posy, pollen coats your weapon. Your next Strike causes the target to be [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) on a hit (sickened 2 on a critical hit). If the creature attempts to recover, it sneezes rather than retching (rolling against the spellheart's spell DC). If you don't make a Strike by the end of your next turn, the pollen becomes inert. Plant creatures are immune.
Brightbloom Posy **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 125 1.1 **Price** 450 gp --- Brightbloom Posy (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 125 1.1 **Price** 1,300 gp --- The spell DC is 28. Brightbloom Posy (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 125 1.1 **Price** 36,000 gp --- The spell DC is 41.
